rulesStrings.li: tale_noun->[PAWN_nameDef]'s emerging from a tunnel
image->[PAWN_nameFull] emerging from a tunnel [circumstance_group]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] erupting out of a tunnel [circumstance_group]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] striking out of a tunnel [circumstance_group]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] travelling in a tunnel [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->in front of a [TerrainFeature]
circumstance_phrase->with incredible force
circumstance_phrase->in a plume of dust and rocks
circumstance_phrase->with debries flying dramatically
circumstance_phrase->in a precision strike
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is concentrating intently on tunneling.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] has [PAWN_possessive] eyes fixed and looks eager.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is enraged, [PAWN_possessive] tongue lolling out, drool dripping.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is smiling with grim joy.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] seems to have no idea what [PAWN_pronoun] is doing.
desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is strapped in with [PAWN_possessive] eyes closed, totally helpless.
desc_sentence->There is a faint sound of fying bacon before the ground gives way.
desc_sentence->A nearby [Animal] is looking up, startled.
desc_sentence->A [Animal] is fleeing the commotion in fear.
desc_sentence->There is a [TerrainFeature] in the background.
desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches silently from afar.
